verbose_text: To examine if the activation of the PI3K/Akt/p70S6K signaling pathway was necessary for the development of hypoxic pulmonary vascular remodeling, NVP-BEZ235 was used to block the PI3K/Akt/p70S6K signaling pathway and the results indicated that the hypoxia induced pulmonary vascular remodeling was attenuated.
evidence: NVP-BEZ235 was used to block the PI3K/Akt/p70S6K
